inputs.remark: 缺少 V2 (one year follow up)。

logic_summary: Added V2 (1-year follow-up) to expected_interpretations_by_visit based on the text describing the follow-up appointment results (LDL decrease, MAQ/A-MISO-S scores).

value.collective_interpretation: At the 1-year follow-up, the patient demonstrated no change in pure-tone thresholds compared to baseline. However, results indicated worsened hyperacusis with LDLs markedly decreased to 35-50 dB HL. Misophonia severity increased to the extreme category with an MAQ score of 60 and A-MISO-S score of 21. The patient was visibly distressed, communicated only by text, and reported inconsistent use of sound therapy.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: No change in pure-tone air conduction thresholds compared to baseline (250-20,000 Hz).

tests.name: Loudness Discomfort Levels (LDL)
tests.result_summary: Markedly decreased to levels between 35 and 50 dB HL in each ear.
